original_text: And in anger his master delivered him to the jailers, until he should pay all his debt.
korean_text: 주인이 노하여 그 빚을 다 갚도록 그를 옥졸들에게 넘기니라

sentences.original_text: And in anger his master delivered him to the jailers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주인은 분노하여 그를 간수들에게 넘겨주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: until he should pay all his debt.
